type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"NewsArticle","mainEntityOfPage":"https://www.timesnownews.com/entertainment-news/shah-rukh-khan-celebrating-kkr-win-with-specially-abled-knight-harshul-will-make-your-heart-melt-watch-bollywood-news-article-99310800","url":"https://www.timesnownews.com/entertainment-news/shah-rukh-khan-celebrating-kkr-win-with-specially-abled-knight-harshul-will-make-your-heart-melt-watch-bollywood-news-article-99310800","articleBody":"Shah Rukh Khan is called King of Bollywood for a reason! The Pathaan superstar grabbed the limelight as he graced his presence at Eden Gardens for Indian Premier League (IPL) for the match between his team Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) and Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB). Last night (April 6), KKR beat and registered a huge win against RCB by 81 runs. Several glimpses and videos are currently making waves on the internet. From dancing to Jhoome Jo Pathaan to hugging Virat Kohli, SRK treated everyone with kind gestures. He also met specially-abled KKR fan Harshul and showered him with love. For the unversed, the Bollywood actor had also met him back in 2018. A video of SRK meeting and greeting him with warmth has gone viral on the internet.Reacting to SRK's warmth and kind gestures towards him, a netizen wrote, \"Srk ek hi dil kitni baar jitoge\", while another said, \"Man With A Golden Heart.\" While other showered immense love on him and commeted, \"He is not just a superstar he is one of the best man\"Besides this, Shah Rukh Khan also tightly hugged Virat Kohli after the match and we've to agree that it's the best thing on the internet today!Meanwhile, on the work front, after the success of Pathaan, Shah Rukh Khan will be next seen in Atlee's Jawan alongside Nayanthara. He also has Rajkumar Hirani's Dunki with Taapsee Pannu. The <em><keyword id="12756474" type="General" weightage="20" keywordseo="Pathaan" source="Orion">Pathaan</keyword></em> superstar grabbed the limelight as he graced his presence at Eden Gardens for Indian Premier League (IPL) for the match between his team <a id="15946260" type="TOPIC" weightage="20" keywordseo="Kolkata-Knight-Riders" source="TOPIC" sourcekeytype="null" meta keywordsubtype="null" seopath="topic/general/​kolkata-knight-riders" entityname="Kolkata Knight Riders" hostid="183" entityid="kolkata-knight-riders" solralias seotitle="kolkata-knight-riders" msid="90401203" title="Kolkata Knight Riders" href="/topic/kolkata-knight-riders">Kolkata Knight Riders</a> (<a id="6354544" type="General" weightage="20" keywordseo="KKR" source="Orion" href="/topic/kkr">KKR</a>) and Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB). Last night (April 6), KKR beat and registered a huge win against RCB by 81 runs. </div><div class="_18840" style="visibility:hidden;padding:10px 15px 0 15px"></div><div></div><div class="_18840" style="visibility:visible;padding:0px 15px 10px 15px;font-size:1rem">Several glimpses and videos are currently making waves on the internet. From dancing to <em>Jhoome Jo Pathaan</em> to hugging Virat Kohli, SRK treated everyone with kind gestures. He also met specially-abled KKR fan Harshul and showered him with love.             var match = document.cookie.match(new RegExp('(^| )' + Cname + '=([^;]+)'));
            if (match) {
              return (match[2]);
            }
            else{
              return null;
            } 
          }
          
          function loadComscore() {
              try {
                if(!window.location.href.includes('/amp')) {
                  let hostName = window.location.host
                  let domainName = hostName.substring(hostName.indexOf('.'))
                  delete_cookie('comScore', '/', domainName)
                }
              } catch(e) { console.log('Error: in FireComScore',e)}

            if (typeof(COMSCORE) === "undefined" && window.location.href.indexOf('/embed/') === -1) {
              var s = document.createElement("script"),
              el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
              s.async = true;
              s.src =
                (document.location.protocol == "https:" ? "https://sb" : "http://b") +
                ".scorecardresearch.com/beacon.js";
              el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
            }
          };
          function fireComscore(comScoreObj={}) {
            let comScoreToPassed = {} 
            if(__getCookie('privacy-policy') && __getCookie('privacy-policy') === '1') {
              comScoreToPassed = {'cs_ucfr':'1',...comScoreObj}
            }
            if (typeof(COMSCORE) !== "undefined" && typeof(COMSCORE.beacon) === "function") {
              COMSCORE.beacon({...objComScore,...comScoreToPassed});
            }
          };
          if (window.TimesGDPR && TimesGDPR.common.consentModule.gdprCallback) {
            TimesGDPR.common.consentModule.gdprCallback(function(dataObj) {
              if (dataObj.isEUuser) {
                objComScore["cs_ucfr"] = '';
              }
              _comscore.push(objComScore);
              loadComscore();
            });
          } else{
            let comScoreValue = ''
            if(__getCookie('privacy-policy') && __getCookie('privacy-policy') ==='1') {
              comScoreValue = '1'
            }
            objComScore["cs_ucfr"] = comScoreValue;
            _comscore.push(objComScore);
            loadComscore();
          }
          </script><script>(function() {
    /** CONFIGURATION START **/
    var _sf_async_config = window._sf_async_config = (window._sf_async_config || { });
    _sf_async_config.uid = 10538;

    _sf_async_config.flickerControl = false;
    _sf_async_config.useCanonical = true;
    _sf_async_config.useCanonicalDomain = true;
    _sf_async_config.sections = 'entertainment-news' ;
    _sf_async_config.authors = 'sushmita.dey@timesgroup.com';
    /** CONFIGURATION END **/
    function loadChartbeat() {
        var e = document.createElement('script');
    var n = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    e.type = 'text/javascript';
    e.async = true;
    e.src = '//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js';;
    n.parentNode.insertBefore(e, n);
    }
    loadChartbeat();
  })()</script><script>window._ibeat_track = null;//window._ibeat_track || {};
        function loadiBeat() {
            var s = document.createElement("script"),
            el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
            s.async = true;
            s.src = 'https://agi-static.indiatimes.com/cms-common/ibeat.min.js';
            el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
            // var ibeatInterval = setInterval(()=>{
            //     if(window.iBeatPgTrend){
            //       window.iBeatPgTrend.logibevent=$/{logibevent};
            //       clearInterval(ibeatInterval);
            //       console.log('Finished logibevent')
            //     }
            // }, 1000)
        };
        // Lets wait for eu response.
        if (window.TimesGDPR && TimesGDPR.common.consentModule.gdprCallback){
            TimesGDPR.common.consentModule.gdprCallback(function(dataObj){
                if (dataObj.isEUuser){_ibeat_track= {sCookie: false};}
                setTimeout(()=>{
                    loadiBeat();
                }, 5000)

            });
        }
        else{
            // _ibeat_track= {sCookie: false}; 
            setTimeout(()=>{
                loadiBeat();
            }, 5000)
        }</script><div id="universalVideoPlayer" style="position:absolute;bottom:1000px"></div><div id="masterVideoPlayer" class="playerContainer rootVideoContainer" data-msid="" data-path="" style="position:absolute;bottom:1000px"></div><div data-hyb-ssp-in-image-overlay="62ea98974d506e73e439dbae"></div><script>window.addEventListener("message",e=>{"https://www.timesnownews.com"==e.origin&&"dark"==e.data&&"dark"!=localStorage.getItem("themeColor")&&document.querySelector("#darkCheckBox").click()});</script><script>window.addEventListener("message",e=>{"https://www.timesnownews.com"==e.origin&&"hyundai"==e.data&&document.getElementById("openPopupBtn").click()});</script><script async="" src="//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat_mab.js"></script></body></html>

main.articleBody: Shah Rukh Khan is called King of Bollywood for a reason! The Pathaan superstar grabbed the limelight as he graced his presence at Eden Gardens for Indian Premier League (IPL) for the match between his team Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) and Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB). Last night (April 6), KKR beat and registered a huge win against RCB by 81 runs. Several glimpses and videos are currently making waves on the internet. From dancing to Jhoome Jo Pathaan to hugging Virat Kohli, SRK treated everyone with kind gestures. He also met specially-abled KKR fan Harshul and showered him with love. For the unversed, the Bollywood actor had also met him back in 2018. A video of SRK meeting and greeting him with warmth has gone viral on the internet.Reacting to SRK's warmth and kind gestures towards him, a netizen wrote, "Srk ek hi dil kitni baar jitoge", while another said, "Man With A Golden Heart." While other showered immense love on him and commeted, "He is not just a superstar he is one of the best man"Besides this, Shah Rukh Khan also tightly hugged Virat Kohli after the match and we've to agree that it's the best thing on the internet today!Meanwhile, on the work front, after the success of Pathaan, Shah Rukh Khan will be next seen in Atlee's Jawan alongside Nayanthara. He also has Rajkumar Hirani's Dunki with Taapsee Pannu.
main.headline: Shah Rukh Khan Celebrating KKR Win With Specially-Abled Knight Harshul Will Make Your Heart Melt. WATCH
main.keywords: Shah Rukh Khan,Pathaan,Bollywood News,Kolkata Knight Riders,KKR,
